purpleculture_pinyin:
shuǎng
bright; clear; crisp; open; frank; straightforward; to feel well; fine; pleasurable; invigorating; to deviate
яркий; Чисто; хрустящий; открыто; откровенный; простой; чувствовать себя хорошо; отлично; приятный; бодрящий; отклоняться

爽爽RShappy, cheerful, refreshing, sweet
  • RS. originally the objects on each side were wells 井: → 爽: possibly the briskness of (a person 大) bathing in a well
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A person 大 breathing lots of fresh air 爻
purpleculture_examples:
凉爽 [ liáng shuǎng ]: cool and refreshing
爽朗 [ shuǎng lǎng ]: clear and bright (of weather); straightforward; candid; open
清爽 [ qīng shuǎng ]: fresh and cool; relaxed
豪爽 [ háo shuǎng ]: outspoken and straightforward; forthright; expansive
直爽 [ zhí shuǎng ]: straightforward; outspoken

heisig_chinese_memo: The St. Bernard is bracing itself for an operation requiring four stitches. He asks the doctor to be frank about how painful it's going to be.
heisig_constituent: bracing, large, St. Bernard, sheaf, sheaf4
heisig_story: The sense of the key word is of something refreshing and invigorating. It is made up of the St. Bernard and a pair of sheaves on each side.
koohiiStory1: The St Bernard is bracing itself for an operation requiring four stitches.
koohiiStory2: St. Bernard dog had a refreshing bracing bath and now is shaking all the water out of his fur. The drops are thrown in all direction and that's why the have an x shape in the pictogram.
kunYomi: あき.らか、さわ.やか、たがう
jp_example_words: 爽やか(さわやか): fresh, refreshing, invigorating, clear, fluent, eloquent
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A big treasure treasure treasure treasure is refreshing! Sorry, I can’t say treasure treasure treasure treasure without saying it four times. See? I did it again. Anyway, this big treasure treasure treasure treasure is really refreshing. It’s been a long time since you found a treasure treasure treasure treasure, so finding this big one is really refreshing.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine finding this big treasure treasure treasure treasure and being really refreshed and relieved and happy. This treasure treasure treasure treasure is so big, you’ll be set for life!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You’d had a sour (さわ) taste in your mouth for not being able to find any treasure treasure treasure treasure for such a long time, but now that you found this big one, the sour taste is totally gone and it’s sooooo refreshing!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine the most sour taste you could ever imagine. So super-duper sour! Now imagine that sour taste instantly melting away once you discover this big refreshing treasure treasure treasure treasure. Jackpot!

humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscriptions from " big " to second ◎, add ◎ to the left and right armpits of " big " (human form), ◎ varies widely, or fire-shaped, or close to bean-shaped, or round, or Crossed oblique drawing. Ji Xusheng said that the elephant holds two arms under the armpit, which means that the left and the right match each other. The original meaning is match, and the extension means spouse and complement.

Jia Jinwen means spouse, "Collection" 36186 "Shiren Shuang Yugeng", namely Shiren and his spouse Yugeng. The Second Sacrifice: "Fang Yu Dagger (妣) Bing Yu Ri Da Yi Shuang" means that it coincides with the sacrifice of Da Yi's spouse, Da Yi Bing Ri. Jin Wen also expressed assistance and assistance, and ordered Fang Zun: "Today, I order (order) and woman (ru), Kang Yukuangshuang, and Yu Nailiao to (and) are friends." It means that I order Kang and Kuan to be friends. Assist your colleagues and friends. It also indicated an error, and the scattered disc: "Yu You (you) cool [宀䜌], a thousand penalties for a thousand whips."

In addition, the books "Mei Shuang" (The morning was still dark when) the " cool ", Jin writing from the " funeral " from " date ", " mourning " sound mark, " Day " is a righteous character, never writing " " Shuang ", the classic word " shuang " should be a borrowed word.

"Shuowen": "Shuang, Ming Ye. Cong 㸚 from the big. 𤕤, seal text is cool." Duan Yucai's note: "Shuang Ben Xing Ming. The Ming is the best but the students are poor, so the extension of the training is also. In the dynasty, half It's half-clear, so it's early and cool."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " big " to the second ◎ are added to the left and right armpits of the " big " (human-shaped). ◎ varies widely. It may be fire-shaped, or close to bean-shaped, or round, or Crossed oblique drawing. Ji Xusheng said that the elephant holds two arms under the armpit, which means that the left and the right match each other. The original meaning is match, and the extension means spouse and complement.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「大」從二◎，在「大」(人形)的左右腋下分別加◎，◎變化多端，或為火形，或與豆形近，或為圓形，或為交叉之斜畫。季旭昇謂象人腋下挾二器，以會左右相配之意，本義是相配，引申表示配偶、輔相。

　　甲金文表示配偶，《合集》36186「示壬爽妣庚」，即示壬及其配偶妣庚。二祀𠨘其卣：「遘于匕(妣)丙肜日大乙爽」，表示適逢大乙的配偶妣丙肜日之祭。金文還表示輔相、輔助，夨令方尊：「今我隹令(命)女(汝)二人亢眔夨爽左右于乃寮以(與)乃友事。」表示我命令亢和夨兩人輔助你們的同僚和友官。又表示差錯，散氏盤：「余又(有)爽[宀䜌]，鞭千罰千。」

　　此外，典籍「昧爽」(天將亮而尚暗之時)之「爽」，金文寫作從「喪」從「日」，「喪」標聲，「日」是義符，從不寫作「爽」，典籍作「爽」應是假借字。

　　《說文》：「爽，明也。从㸚从大。𤕤，篆文爽。」段玉裁注：「爽本訓明。明之至而差生焉，故引伸訓差也。朝旦之時，半昧半明，故謂之早昧爽。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「大」從二◎，在「大」(人形)的左右腋下分別加◎，◎變化多端，或為火形，或與豆形近，或為圓形，或為交叉之斜畫。季旭昇謂象人腋下挾二器，以會左右相配之意，本義是相配，引申表示配偶、輔相。

爽字的基本解释

爽
shuǎng
明朗，清亮：爽目。
轻松，利落：清爽。凉爽。爽口。
痛快，率（shu刬 ）直：爽朗。爽快。爽利。豪爽。直爽。
差失，违背：爽信。爽约（失约）。毫厘不爽。屡试不爽。
干脆，索性：爽性。
舒服：爽心。爽意。爽适。身体不爽。

爽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuǎng］
［《廣韻》疎兩切，上養，生。］
亦作“慡1”。
(1)明亮；清朗。
(2)昌明。
(3)开阔；宽阔。
(4)豪爽。
(5)畅快；舒服。
(6)《左传·昭公七年》：“用物精多，則魂魄强，是以有精爽至於神明。”孔颖达疏：“精，亦神也；爽，亦明也。精是神之未著，爽是明之未昭。”后用以指心神、神志。
(7)用以指依附于形体的精神，即所谓“魄”。
(8)差失；不合。
(9)差别；不同。
(10)丧失；失去。
(11)伤败；败坏。
(12)受伤害。
(13)古代南诏国所设官制名。
(14)句首助词。
(15)书法用语。肃穆飘然。
(16)古水名。爽水。在函谷关城东，又名紵麻涧。
(17)通“鷞”。
(18)通“”。草鞋上的绞绳。
[②]［shuāng］
［《集韻》師莊切，平陽，生。］
通“驦1”。

爽字的英文翻译

◎ 爽
bright, clear, deviate, feel well, frank, straightforward

爽字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【爻字部】　爽； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页690第22
〔古文〕?【唐韻】疏兩切【集韻】所兩切，?音塽。【說文】明也。从㸚从大。【註】徐鍇曰：大，其中?縫光也。【書·仲虺之誥】用爽厥師。【傳】爽，明也。又【盤庚】故有爽德自上。【傳】湯有明德在天。◎按蔡傳：故有爽德爲句。自上二字連下，其罰汝三字爲句，爽訓失也。與孔傳異。又康誥：爽惟民迪吉康。又大誥：爽邦由哲。左傳昭四年：二惠競爽。又昭七年：是以有精爽，至于神明。　又【書·太甲】先王昧爽丕顯。又【牧誓】時甲子昧爽。【傳】昧爽，早旦。　又【左傳·昭三年】請更諸爽塏者。【註】爽，明也。〇按增韻云：又淸快也。卽爽塏之義。又史記屈原賈誼傳：爽然自失矣。　又【爾雅·釋言】爽，差也，忒也。【揚子·方言】爽，過也。【書·洛誥】惟事其爽侮。【周語】晉侯爽二。【列子·黃帝篇】昏然五情爽惑。　又【揚子·方言】爽猛也。齊晉曰爽。　又【廣韻】烈也。　又貴也。　又星名。細爽，免星七之一。見【史記·天官書】　又【左傳·昭十七年】爽鳩氏司?也。【註】爽鳩，鷹也。　又人名，左爽見【戰國

爽字的源字形

爽字的起名意思

：干脆，直率，痛快。明朗，清亮。

Cool
Basic explanation of words
Cool
shuǎng
Bright, clear: refreshing.
Relaxed and neat: refreshing. cool. tasty.
Happy, straight (shu 刬): hearty. readily. Refreshing. Outrageous. Straightforward.
Mistakes, violations: Shuangxin. Relapse (no appointment). Not at all uncomfortable. Tried and tested.
Simply, simply: refreshing.
Comfortable: refreshing. Refreshing. Shuangshi. The body is uncomfortable.
Cool
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuǎng］
["Guangyun" Nine cuts in two, nourishing and healthy. ]
Also known as "慡1".
(1) Bright; clear.
(2) Changming.
(3) Open; broad.
(4) Outstanding.
(5) Carefree; comfortable.
(6) "Zuo Zhuan·Seventh Year of Zhaogong": "If you use more essence, you will have a strong soul, so you have a sharpness as a god." Kong Yingda Shu: "Essence, also God; cool, also Ming. Essence is God It’s not written, it’s cool is not clear.” Later it is used to refer to the mind and mind.
(7) It is used to refer to the spirit attached to the body, the so-called "spirit".
(8) Loss; disagreement.
(9) Difference; different.
(10) Lost; lost.
(11) Injury and defeat; corruption.
(12) Injured.
(13) The official name of the ancient Nanzhao State.
(14) Auxiliary word at the beginning of a sentence.
(15) Calligraphy terms. Solemn and floated.
(16) Ancient water names. Refreshing. In the east of Hangu Pass, it is also known as 纻麻涧.
(17) Through "鷞".
(18) Pass "". Twisted rope on straw shoes.
[②]［shuāng］
["Jiyun" teacher Zhuangqi, Pingyang, born. ]
Same as "骦1".

[Biography] Tang You Mingde is in the sky. ◎According to Cai Chuan: So there is Shuangde as a sentence. From the upper two characters to the next, the sentence of punishment is three words, which is to make you lose the training. Different from Kong Chuan. You Kang: Shuang Weimin Dijikang. Another big talk: Shuangbang Youzhe. Zuo Chuanzhao four years: Erhui Jingshuang. In the seventh year of the Zhao Dynasty: So there is sophistication, as for the gods.　[Book·Taijia] Xian Wang Shuang Pixian. Also【Powder】When Jiazi is so cool. [Biography] Mishuang, early day.　[Zuo Zhuan·Three Years of Zhao] Please be more refreshing. [Note] Shuang, Ming Ye. 〇By Zeng Yunyun: It's fast again. The meaning of 卽 Shuang Kai. Also in the Records of the History of Qu Yuan and Jia Yi's Biography: Surely I lost myself.　[Erya·Explanation] It’s cool, bad, and ugly. [Yangtze Dialect] It's cool, and it's too easy. [Book·Luogao] It's only an insult to it. [Zhou Yu] Jin Hou Shuang Er. 【Liezi·Huangdi】Familiar with five emotions and bewilderment.　[Yangtze Dialect] Shuangmeng also. Qi Jin said cool.　[Guang Yun] Lie Ye.　It's expensive too.　Also star name. Fine and cool, one of the seven star-free. Name meaning
: Simply, straightforward, and happy. Bright and clear.
K shuăng
金
本义是“明亮”。甲骨文的字形
像一个直立的人,左右有火盆或灯
盡;不过后来变形较多,很难看出它
的原来的含义。《尚书》: “甲子味爽,
王朝至于商郊牧野,乃誓。”“味爽”即
“早晨”。

К шуанг
золото
Первоначальное значение - «яркий».
По форме надписи на костях оракула похожи на стоящего человека, с жаровнями или лампами слева и справа, но деформировались позже, и было трудно разглядеть его первоначальное значение.
«Шан Шу»: «У Цзяцзы крутой вкус, а династия такая же хорошая, как Шаньцзяо Муе». «Вешуан» означает «утро».
Текст
Сяохао
Упрощенные символы
Печальный
shuǎng
I прил. /наречие
1) приятный, весёлый, радостный; здоровый духом; энергичный
感觉很爽 чувствовать радость
身体不爽 неможется
2) светлый, ясный, чистый
神清目爽 душою чист и взором светел
3) ясный (сердцем), открытый (душой), честный, прямой; напрямки, в открытую, сплеча
4) ошибочный, неправильный, неверный
其德不爽 его добродетели безупречны
II гл.
1) портиться, разлагаться
五味令人口爽 разнообразие вкусовых ощущений портит вкус человека (Лао-цзы)
2) нарушать, отклоняться (от чего-л.)
毫厘不爽 не отклоняться ни на йоту
3) жарг. заниматься сексом
III сущ.
* немой
不学其言不若爽 если не учиться, то слова твои будут хуже, чем у немого
IV собств.
Шуан (фамилия)
Radicals: 大, メ  (big, treasure)
Meaning Mnemonic
A big treasure treasure treasure treasure is refreshing! Sorry, I can’t say treasure treasure treasure treasure without saying it four times. See? I did it again. Anyway, this big treasure treasure treasure treasure is really refreshing. It’s been a long time since you found a treasure treasure treasure treasure, so finding this big one is really refreshing.
Imagine finding this big treasure treasure treasure treasure and being really refreshed and relieved and happy. This treasure treasure treasure treasure is so big, you’ll be set for life!
Reading Mnemonic
You’d had a sour (さわ) taste in your mouth for not being able to find any treasure treasure treasure treasure for such a long time, but now that you found this big one, the sour taste is totally gone and it’s sooooo refreshing!
Imagine the most sour taste you could ever imagine. So super-duper sour! Now imagine that sour taste instantly melting away once you discover this big refreshing treasure treasure treasure treasure. Jackpot!
